# ControllingSeats.inherited

**Case**

The value is inherited from the parent. The table implicit value is considered to be `.any`.

## Declaration

```swift
case inherited
```

## Seats

- **ControllingSeats.any**: Lets players in all seats interact with the equipment.
- **ControllingSeats.restricted(_:)**: Lets players in specific seats interact with the equipment.
- **ControllingSeats.restrictedCurrent(_:)**: Lets players in specific seats interact with the equipment if they are currently in turn.
- **ControllingSeats.current**: Lets only seats currently in turn interact with the equipment.
